## âœ¨ Phase 3 Features

### 11. ðŸ“… **Calendar View**

**Plan ahead visually!**

**How it works:**
- Full monthly calendar grid display
- Click any date to assign due date to tasks
- Visual task indicators (colored dots) on calendar dates
- Navigate between months with Previous/Next buttons
- Today's date is highlighted
- See all tasks due on any date
- Overdue tasks highlighted in red

**Visual Features:**
- Clean month calendar layout
- Color-coded task dots by category
- Today highlighted with special styling
- Easy month navigation (< January 2025 >)
- Task list for selected date
- Due date persists across sessions

**Why it's amazing:**
- Long-term planning visibility
- Visual deadline management
- See upcoming commitments at a glance
- Plan weeks and months ahead
- Never miss a deadline

**ADHD Benefits:**
- External time visualization
- Reduces time blindness
- Future planning made visible
- Deadline anxiety management
- Visual scheduling support

**How to use:**
1. Click ðŸ“… Calendar button
2. Navigate to desired month
3. Click date to see tasks or assign due dates
4. Due dates appear as colored dots
5. Click date to view all tasks due that day

---

### 12. ðŸ“Š **Analytics Dashboard**

**Understand your productivity patterns!**

**Metrics Displayed:**
- **Completion Rate** - % of tasks completed (daily/weekly/monthly)
- **Tasks Per Day** - Average daily task velocity
- **Current Streak** - Consecutive days with completions
- **Category Breakdown** - Which categories you work on most
- **Most Productive Times** - When you complete tasks (Morning/Midday/Afternoon)

**Visual Charts:**
- Gradient stat cards for key metrics
- Category breakdown with progress bars
- Productive times display
- Clean, motivating design

**Why it's amazing:**
- Pattern recognition
- Motivation through progress
- Self-awareness of productivity
- Data-driven insights
- Identify best times to work

**ADHD Benefits:**
- Visual progress = dopamine!
- Pattern awareness
- Understand your rhythms
- Celebrate streaks
- Objective self-assessment

**Metrics Explained:**
- **Completion Rate**: Tasks completed vs. total tasks (last 30 days)
- **Tasks/Day**: Average daily output
- **Streak**: Consecutive days with at least 1 completion
- **Category Breakdown**: % distribution across work/personal/health/etc.
- **Productive Times**: Which time blocks you complete most tasks

---

### 13. ðŸ“‘ **Task Templates**

**Stop retyping common tasks!**

**Features:**
- Save any task as a reusable template
- Quick-add tasks from template library
- Pre-defined templates included:
  - **Morning Routine** (meditation, exercise, breakfast)
  - **Evening Wind-Down** (reflect, plan tomorrow, sleep prep)
  - **Weekly Planning** (review week, set priorities, schedule)
  - **Work Session** (deep work with break reminders)
  - **Health Check** (water, movement, meals)
  - **Quick Errands** (common shopping/errands)

**Template Saves:**
- Task text
- Category & Priority
- All subtasks
- Notes and context
- Time estimates

**How it works:**
1. Create a task with subtasks/notes/etc.
2. Click "Save as Template" button
3. Give template a name
4. Template saved to library
5. Later: click "Add from Template" to instantly create task

**Template Management:**
- View all templates
- Edit existing templates
- Delete unused templates
- Organize by type

**Why it's amazing:**
- Massive time saver
- Consistency in routines
- Best practices capture
- One-click task creation
- No more forgetting steps

**ADHD Benefits:**
- Reduce decision fatigue
- Faster task capture
- Routine automation
- Lower executive function load
- Structure without thinking

**Perfect For:**
- Daily routines
- Weekly reviews
- Recurring projects
- Standard workflows
- Common errands

---

### 14. ðŸŽ¯ **Focus Mode**

**Eliminate ALL distractions!**

**How it works:**
- Press `F` key anywhere to enter Focus Mode
- Fullscreen overlay shows ONLY your current task
- Beautiful purple gradient background
- Large, prominent task display
- Shows task notes inline
- Displays all subtasks with checkboxes
- Timer-ready (integrates with Focus Timer)
- Press Escape to exit

**Visual Design:**
- Immersive fullscreen overlay
- Calming purple gradient background
- Large 2.5em task text
- Frosted glass card effect
- Minimal UI - just the task
- Exit and Complete buttons only

**Why it's amazing:**
- Total focus on ONE thing
- No visual distractions
- Hyperfocus-friendly
- Clear task + context visible
- Easy exit (Esc key)

**ADHD Benefits:**
- Supports hyperfocus state
- Eliminates tab-switching
- Single-tasking enforcement
- Reduces overwhelm
- Deep work enabler
- Context always visible

**How to use:**
1. Have at least one task in Today
2. Press `F` key (or click Focus Mode button)
3. Fullscreen mode activates
4. Work on the ONE task shown
5. Mark complete or press Escape to exit
6. If marked complete, shows next task

**Integration:**
- Works with all task types
- Shows notes and subtasks
- Can start Focus Timer from within
- Keyboard navigation
- Mobile-friendly

| **Search** | **Phase 1** | **Navigation** | Find anything fast |
| **View Filters** | **Phase 1** | **Navigation** | All/Today/Incomplete |
| **Priority Filters** | **Phase 1** | **Navigation** | Filter by priority/category |
| **Import Data** | **Phase 1** | **Data** | Restore backups |
| **Weekly Review** | **Phase 1** | **Reflection** | Structured review |
| **Time Blocking** | **Phase 2** | **Planning** | Visual day schedule |
| **Keyboard Shortcuts** | **Phase 2** | **UX** | 10+ shortcuts |

**Total: 25+ features across Core + 3 Phases!**

## ðŸ’¡ How to Use Phase 3 Features Together

### Weekly Planning Flow:
1. **Sunday Evening**:
   - Open ðŸ“… Calendar
   - Review next week's commitments
   - Assign due dates to upcoming tasks
   - Use ðŸ“‘ Template: "Weekly Planning"

### Daily Planning Flow:
1. **Morning**:
   - Check ðŸ“… Calendar for today's due dates
   - Review ðŸ“Š Analytics to see your productive times
   - Add tasks from ðŸ“‘ Templates (Morning Routine)
   - Drag high-priority tasks to Morning time block

### Deep Work Flow:
1. **Focus Time**:
   - Pick ONE task from Today
   - Press `F` to enter ðŸŽ¯ Focus Mode
   - Start Focus Timer (Ctrl+T)
   - Work until timer completes
   - Mark complete and exit

### Weekly Review Flow:
1. **Friday Evening**:
   - Open ðŸ“Š Analytics Dashboard
   - Review completion rate and streak
   - Identify patterns in category breakdown
   - Note productive times for next week
   - Use Weekly Review modal (Ctrl+W)
   - Plan next week using Calendar view

---

## ðŸ”¥ Power User Workflows

### The Complete ADHD Workflow:

**1. CAPTURE** (Brain Dump + Quick Add + Templates)
- Press Ctrl+B for brain dump when overwhelmed
- Use templates for common tasks
- Quick add to Today (Ctrl+N)

**2. ORGANIZE** (Lists + Categories + Priorities + Calendar)
- Drag tasks between lists
- Assign categories and priorities
- Set due dates on calendar
- Break down into subtasks

**3. PLAN** (Calendar + Time Blocking + Analytics)
- Use calendar for long-term view
- Check analytics for best times
- Drag to time blocks (Morning/Midday/Afternoon)
- Use templates for routines

**4. EXECUTE** (Focus Mode + Timer + Shortcuts)
- Press F for Focus Mode
- Start timer (Ctrl+T)
- Use keyboard shortcuts
- Mark complete

**5. TRACK** (Stats + Analytics + Weekly Review)
- Check daily stats
- Review analytics patterns
- Weekly review (Ctrl+W)
- Celebrate wins

**6. OPTIMIZE** (Templates + Insights + Recurring)
- Save successful tasks as templates
- Set recurring for habits
- Review analytics to find patterns
- Adjust schedule based on energy

---

## ðŸŽ“ Technical Details

### File Information:
- **Filename**: `adhd-life-manager-pro-complete.html`
- **File Size**: ~115KB
- **Format**: Single HTML file (portable!)
- **Dependencies**: None (zero!)
- **Storage**: Browser localStorage
- **Offline**: Works 100% offline

### New Functions Added (Phase 3):

**Calendar:**
- `openCalendar()` - Display calendar modal
- `generateCalendar(year, month)` - Create month grid
- `assignDueDate(taskId, date)` - Set task due date
- `getTasksForDate(date)` - Get tasks by date
- `navigateMonth(offset)` - Change month

**Analytics:**
- `openAnalytics()` - Display analytics modal
- `calculateAnalytics()` - Compute all metrics
- `calculateCompletionRate()` - % completion
- `calculateTasksPerDay()` - Daily average
- `calculateStreak()` - Current streak
- `getCategoryBreakdown()` - Category distribution
- `getMostProductiveTimes()` - Time analysis

**Templates:**
- `openTemplates()` - Show template modal
- `saveAsTemplate(taskId)` - Save task as template
- `loadFromTemplate(templateId, list)` - Create from template
- `renderTemplates()` - Display template library
- `deleteTemplate(templateId)` - Remove template
- Pre-defined templates array

**Focus Mode:**
- `enterFocusMode()` - Activate focus overlay
- `exitFocusMode()` - Close focus mode
- `markFocusTaskComplete()` - Complete from focus
- Keyboard: F to enter, Escape to exit

### Data Structure (Final):

```javascript
let data = {
  tasks: {
    today: [],
    week: [],
    someday: []
  },
  wins: [],
  energyLog: [],
  medicationLog: [],
  focusSessions: [],
  settings: {
    medicationTime: '08:00'
  },
  templates: []  // Phase 3
};

// Task object (complete)
{
  id: 123,
  text: "Task name",
  category: "work",
  priority: "high",
  completed: false,
  created: "2025-11-07T12:00:00Z",
  time: "30min",

  // Phase 1
  subtasks: [
    { text: "Step 1", completed: false }
  ],

  // Phase 2
  timeBlock: "morning",  // morning/midday/afternoon/null
  notes: "Task details and context...",
  recurrence: {
    pattern: "daily",  // daily/weekly/monthly
    daysOfWeek: [1,3,5],  // for weekly
    dayOfMonth: 15  // for monthly
  },

  // Phase 3
  dueDate: "2025-11-15"  // ISO date string
}

// Template object
{
  id: 1,
  name: "Morning Routine",
  template: {
    text: "Morning Routine",
    category: "personal",
    priority: "high",
    time: "60min",
    subtasks: [...],
    notes: "..."
  }
}
```

### Browser Compatibility:
- âœ… Chrome/Edge (best experience)
- âœ… Firefox (full support)
- âœ… Safari (full support)
- âœ… Mobile browsers (responsive design)

## ðŸš€ Getting Started

### First Time Setup (Phase 3):
1. Open `adhd-life-manager-pro-complete.html` in browser
2. Click ðŸ“… Calendar - explore the calendar view
3. Click ðŸ“Š Analytics - see your stats dashboard
4. Click ðŸ“‘ Templates - check out pre-defined templates
5. Press `F` to try Focus Mode
6. Press `?` to see all keyboard shortcuts

### Migration from Phase 2:
- Open your Phase 2 file, export data
- Open Phase 3 file, import data
- All features auto-migrate
- Templates start empty (create your own!)
- Calendar starts clear (assign dates as needed)
